stone-walkway.name: Add Stone Walkway
stone-walkway.request: Add a beautiful stone walkway leading to the entrance
stone-walkway.definition: Create an elegant stone walkway with natural stone pavers, proper drainage, and landscaping integration. The walkway should complement the home's architecture and provide a welcoming path to the entrance.
stone-walkway.prompt:
You are a professional interior and exterior designer. I will provide an image of an existing home with a specific renovation request. Your job is to transform the home while preserving its fundamental architectural integrity.

RENOVATION REQUEST: Add a beautiful stone walkway leading to the entrance.

DESIGN BRIEF: Create an elegant stone walkway with natural stone pavers, proper drainage, and landscaping integration. The walkway should complement the home's architecture and provide a welcoming path to the entrance.

CRITICAL REQUIREMENTS:
- Preserve the exact building structure, roof lines, window positions, and overall architectural footprint
- Only modify the specified elements (walkway area)
- Maintain professional photography quality with bright daylight and natural blue sky
- Ensure realistic materials and construction methods

Transform this home with the requested stone walkway addition.
stone-walkway.negativePrompt: Do NOT change the building's fundamental shape, roof angles, number of stories, window count/general position, or the overall structural footprint. Avoid adding new additions, altering the porch structure, changing chimney locations, or completely redesigning the core architecture. No stylized art, cartoons, distorted perspectives, or poor quality textures. No missing elements.

black-windows.request: Replace windows with modern black-framed windows

black-windows.prompt:
You are a professional interior and exterior designer. I will provide an image of an existing home with a specific renovation request. Your job is to transform the home while preserving its fundamental architectural integrity.

RENOVATION REQUEST: Replace windows with modern black-framed windows.

DESIGN BRIEF: Install sleek, modern black-framed windows that provide clean lines and contemporary appeal. Maintain the same window count and approximate positioning while updating to modern styling.

CRITICAL REQUIREMENTS:
- Preserve the exact building structure, roof lines, window count, and overall architectural footprint
- Only modify the window frames and styling
- Maintain professional photography quality with bright daylight and natural blue sky
- Ensure realistic materials and construction methods

Transform this home with the requested modern black window upgrade.
black-windows.negativePrompt: Do NOT change the building's fundamental shape, roof angles, number of stories, window count/general position, or the overall structural footprint. Avoid adding new additions, altering the porch structure, changing chimney locations, or completely redesigning the core architecture. No stylized art, cartoons, distorted perspectives, or poor quality textures. No missing elements.

brick-exterior.name: Add Brick Exterior
brick-exterior.definition: Apply a timeless brick exterior facade that adds character and durability to the home. Use high-quality brick with proper mortar joints and architectural details.

You are a professional interior and exterior designer. I will provide an image of an existing home with a specific renovation request. Your job is to transform the home while preserving its fundamental architectural integrity.

RENOVATION REQUEST: Add classic brick exterior facade.

DESIGN BRIEF: Apply a timeless brick exterior facade that adds character and durability to the home. Use high-quality brick with proper mortar joints and architectural details.

- Preserve the exact building structure, roof lines, window positions, and overall architectural footprint

Transform this home with the requested brick exterior facade.
brick-exterior.negativePrompt: Do NOT change the building's fundamental shape, roof angles, number of stories, window count/general position, or the overall structural footprint. add-extension.name: Add Extension
add-extension.request: Add a thoughtful extension to expand living space
add-extension.definition: Design and add a well-integrated extension that expands the home's living space. For single-story homes, extend outward. For multi-story homes, consider adding an additional floor or extending horizontally. Ensure the extension complements the existing architecture and maintains structural integrity.
add-extension.prompt:
You are a professional interior and exterior designer. I will provide an image of an existing home with a specific renovation request. Your job is to transform the home while preserving its fundamental architectural integrity.

RENOVATION REQUEST: Add a thoughtful extension to expand living space.

DESIGN BRIEF: Design and add a well-integrated extension that expands the home's living space. For single-story homes, extend outward horizontally. For multi-story homes, consider adding an additional floor or extending horizontally. Ensure the extension complements the existing architecture and maintains structural integrity.

CRITICAL REQUIREMENTS:
- Analyze the existing home structure and choose the most appropriate extension method
- Maintain architectural consistency with the original design
- Preserve the existing roof lines and window patterns where possible
- Ensure realistic structural support and construction methods
- Maintain professional photography quality with bright daylight and natural blue sky
- Integrate the extension seamlessly with the existing home

Transform this home with the requested thoughtful extension addition.
add-extension.negativePrompt: Do NOT compromise the structural integrity or create unrealistic additions. Avoid adding extensions that don't match the home's architectural style or that would require major structural changes. No stylized art, cartoons, distorted perspectives, or poor quality textures. No missing elements.

You are a professional interior and exterior designer. I will provide an image of an existing home with a specific renovation request. Your job is to transform the home while preserving its fundamental architectural integrity.

DESIGN BRIEF: Replace the existing roof with modern, high-quality roofing materials such as architectural shingles, metal roofing, or slate. Maintain the existing roof lines while improving durability and aesthetic appeal.

CRITICAL REQUIREMENTS:

- Only modify the roofing materials and finish
- Maintain professional photography quality with bright daylight and natural blue sky
- Ensure realistic materials and construction methods
- Use high-quality roofing materials appropriate for the home's style
- Maintain the existing roof pitch and structural elements

Transform this home with the requested modern roofing upgrade.
roof-upgrade.negativePrompt: Do NOT change the building's fundamental shape, roof angles, number of stories, window count/general position, or the overall structural footprint. Avoid adding new additions, altering the porch structure, changing chimney locations, or completely redesigning the core architecture. No stylized art, cartoons, distorted perspectives, or poor quality textures. No missing elements.
